articles.author: Paul McLeary, Jack Detsch, Jacopo Barigazzi, Chris Lunday
articles.title: Pentagon says US will play a minimal role in Ukraine’s security guarantee - Politico
articles.description: Meetings between NATO and U.S. defense officials left allies concerned that President Donald Trump would leave Europe to ensure a lasting peace in the war-scarred country.
articles.content:
Theres the dawning reality that this will be Europe making this happen on the ground, said a NATO diplomat who was briefed on the talks. The U.S. is not fully committed to anything.
